Package controllers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CarController.Valve
    Valve interface class represents a template for the Valve classes that handle Messages.
    Message
    Represents message (event) sent from View to Controller
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddCarMessage
    Represents Message that is sent when the user clicks the Save Car button in the AddCarView.
    CarController
    Application's Controller class.
    CheckoutMessage
    Represents Message that is sent when the user clicks the Checkout button in the CheckoutCarView.
    ChooseCarMessage
    Represents Message that is sent when the user clicks at some car in the car list.
    ChooseOptionMessage
    Represents Message that is sent when the user chooses an option from the menus of choices in the CheckoutCarView.
    DeleteCarMessage
    Represents Message that is sent when the user clicks the Delete Car button.
    DisplayAddViewMessage
    Represents Message that is sent when the user clicks the Add Car button in the MainView.
    DisplayCarListMessage
    Represents Message that is sent when the user launches the application.
    DisplayCheckoutViewMessage
    Represents Message that is sent when the user clicks the Checkout Car button in the MainView.
    DisplayEditViewMessage
    Represents Message that is sent when the user clicks the Edit Car button in the MainView.
    DisposeMainViewMessage
    Represents Message that is sent when the MainView is closed.
    EditCarMessage
    Represents Message that is sent when the user clicks the Save Car button in the EditCarView.
    EnableMainViewMessage
    Represents Message that is sent when any other View, except the MainView, is closed.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ValveResponse
    Enum class that stores the three Valve responses.
